posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: t206 McGraw Portrait w/ Cap....updated list 6/6/13
posts.post_content:
Looking for help with my t206 McGraw Portrait w/ Cap back run.  

The current want list:

American Beauty 460
EPDG
Sovereign 460
Sweet Caporal 350-460 #25
Sweet Caporal 350-460 #30
Uzit

I prefer graded examples, but open to raw as well.  LMK what you have.  Thanks!

Jimi
New week....another plea!  Any help is appreciated!
Yet another new week, and yet another plea.  :). Any heroes out in net54land?

Here's one in the current Sterling auction (not my card).

Yeah, I have definitely been keeping my tabs on that one.  I have a lead on a Tolstoi, but I'm surprised no one has Sweet Caps!
Just updated the list thanks to picking up the PB.  Still no Sweet Caps!!  HELP!!  :D
I have the T213-2 graded in a 3.  That's a very grade or that card.  Let me know how interested you are.
Just picked up the Tolstoi and Coupon.  Any others are very welcome!  Still no Sweet Caps!!  LOL

Picked up one of the SC backs while on vacation.  Gotta love that!  :)  Any heroes out there on the rest?

Jimi
